content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS, with fuel inventory (2 coal) and furnace_result containing 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status: NO_POWER, electrical_id updated to 11992.
- ElectricityGroup with id=11992 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points [(5.0, 21.5), (0.0, 21.5)], warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”], and status: NOT_CONNECTED; neighbours include pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5), and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water at 15°C, warnings [“out of fuel”], and status: NO_FUEL; connection points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)], steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5), and fluid_systems [44828].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 100 units of water at 15°C, status: WORKING, connection point (-9.5, 23.5), and fluid_systems [44828].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44828 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44829 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44830 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44835 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44834 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44839 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44838 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=44841 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
  • Repeated attempts using preset fluid_system values (44484, 44527, 44570, 44613, 44656, 44699, 44742, 44785) resulted in no working PipeGroup.
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and verify the active fluid_system identifier from the current network configuration before initiating a pipeline connection.
- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • Usage of preset fluid_system values without runtime validation has led to aborted connection attempts.
  • Tip: Validate the network’s fluid configuration dynamically prior to connection.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains unfueled, interrupting the steam cycle.
  • Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to ensure continuous operation.
